summary: This document is a bank statement for Shocker Holdings LLC for the period of July 1, 2015, to July 31, 2015. It details the account balance, service charges, and criteria for waiving those charges, indicating the financial status of the entity during that time.

persons.name: Philip Fintchre
persons.context: Philip Fintchre is identified as the Relationship Manager for the account associated with Shocker Holdings LLC.

keyFacts: The bank statement is for Shocker Holdings LLC for the period of July 1, 2015, to July 31, 2015.
The beginning balance was $514,669.35 and the ending balance remained the same.
A standard monthly service charge of $11.00 was waived due to meeting balance criteria.
The document indicates that the business maintains a total monthly average balance of $351,010.50.
The account is associated with Fifth Third Bank.
